page.title: 01 Emily's Diary
page.content:
Sunday 21st May, 1985
6.00am I had a midnight feast with my cousin called Andrew and with my brother who is called Simon. 9.30am We went outside to play football, there are two goals and you have a ball between two teams and you have to score as many goals as you can in a certain time. 12.30pm We had dinner and we had roast lamb, boiled potatoes, broccoli, carrots and gravy. 2.00pm We got ready to go out and we were going to have a ride on a steam train and we had some crisps. 3.00pm We went to look at some more trains which had to be mended. 3.10pm We went home and there was a gated road and Andrew and I opened one of the gates. 5.15pm Tea with fish fingers. 8.45pm Bedtime.
